name: Amateur Bee
description:
Inspired by a true story, in the year 20XX humanity experiments with replacing bees but things got out of hand ..

As a single well armed bee you are out to destroy the mechanical bees factory floor (well hidden in a cave somewhere)

Created by Mutantleg (me) back in mid 2015
Music is licensed from Arteria3D
Special thanks to BitOfGame for sponsoring the original version

Changes:
no more "more games" buttons
music is toggleable
preloader image replaced
